CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total energy consumption per capita?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Stellar Expanse}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total energy consumption per capita?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Aethelgard City}.

VE.A: Azure Coast's energy consumption per capita is {5.08} MWh/person, Silverhaven District's energy consumption per capita is {5} MWh/person, Aethelgard City's energy consumption per capita is {4.73} MWh/person.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Energy Consumption per Capita exceed 36 MWh/person? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {36.65} MWh/person in {2008}, total value was {37.63} MWh/person in {2007}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Energy Consumption per Capita go below 34 MWh/person? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {33.36} MWh/person in {2010}, total value was {33.87} MWh/person in {2009}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Energy Consumption per Capita fall between 34 and 37 MWh/person? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {36.65} MWh/person in {2008}, total value was {35.31} MWh/person in {2006}, total value was {33.87} MWh/person in {2009}.

NC.Q: Between 2007 and 2010, was the average total Energy Consumption per Capita higher or lower than between 2006 and 2007?
NC.A: The average total energy consumption per capita between {2007} and {2010} was {lower} than between {2006} and {2007}.

NC.Q: Between 2007 and 2009, did the total Energy Consumption per Capita experience a larger or smaller change than between 2008 and 2009?
NC.A: The change in total energy consumption per capita between {2007} and {2009} was {larger} than between {2008} and {2009}.

NC.Q: Was the total Energy Consumption per Capita in 2007 higher or lower than in 2010?
NC.A: The total energy consumption per capita in {2007} was {higher} than in {2010}.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2008, was the average total Energy Consumption per Capita higher or lower than between 2007 and 2009?
NC.A: The average total energy consumption per capita between {2006} and {2008} was {higher} than between {2007} and {2009}.
